name: Nyaatorrents - Clean Black
description:
Black background and removes the top banners and adverts.  Info page is black as well.

Ok, for some reason Adblock Plus (EasyList and Fanboy's List) subscription updates randomly block (and then unblock) all images on Nyaa.  I'm going to recommend disabling Adblock Plus on Nyaa, since it does indeed block the download button.  I'll update this style to remove ads whenever any show up.  Let me know if anyone sees any that I may not be seeing on my computer.
